stripped_text: If Chrysalis is accessed from R&D, the Runner must reveal it. When the Runner accesses Chrysalis, he or she encounters it. Ignore this ability if the Runner accesses Chrysalis from Archives. Subroutine Do 2 net damage.
text:
If Chrysalis is accessed from R&D, the Runner must reveal it.
When the Runner accesses Chrysalis, he or she encounters it. Ignore this ability if the Runner accesses Chrysalis from Archives.
[subroutine] Do 2 net damage.
title: Chrysalis
